lastSession.summary: v8.0.0: Removed Agent Teams support entirely. Direct implementation model replaces 3-specialist team orchestration. Deleted SubagentStart/TeammateIdle/TaskCompleted hooks. 9→6 hook registrations. No longer requires CLAUDE_CODE_EXPERIMENTAL_AGENT_TEAMS.
completedTasks: Removed SubagentStart, TeammateIdle, TaskCompleted from hooks.json
Cleaned session-start.sh and stop.sh of team references
Rewrote flow.md for direct implementation (no team delegation)
Rewrote prd-breakdown.md for direct analysis (no analyst team)
Updated all descriptions, metadata, and README
